## ProducesMiddleware class

Middleware that is used for changing response type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ProducesMiddleware implements RestMiddleware 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [RestMiddleware](./rest.restmiddleware.md)
